sourcesContent:
import { StatusBar } from 'expo-status-bar';
import React from 'react';
// import { SafeAreaView } from 'react-native';
import { StyleSheet, FlatList, Text, SafeAreaView, ScrollView, View } from 'react-native';

import LoginScreen from './src/LoginScreen';
import ChatScreen from './src/ChatScreen';

const App = () => {
  return (
    <SafeAreaView>
      <ScrollView>
          <View>
            <FlatList
            data={messages}
            renderItem={({ item }) => (
              <View style={styles.messageSended}>
                <View style={styles.messageSendedDataView}>
                  <Text style={styles.messageSendedData}>{item.user}</Text>
                  <Text style={styles.messageSendedData}>{item.date}</Text>
                </View>
                <View style={styles.messageSendedTextView}>
                  <Text style={styles.messageSendedText}>
                    {item.message}
                  </Text>
                </View>
              </View>
            )}
            inverted={true}
            keyExtractor={item => item.id}
            />
          </View>
        </ScrollView>
    </SafeAreaView>
  );
}

export default App;
